thread.section_title: The GEM Hotel Chelsea - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Birthday Weekend Stay
thread.title_full: Birthday Weekend Stay - Review of The GEM Hotel Chelsea, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Nicole A
title: Birthday Weekend Stay
text: Everything was good overall. Upon arrival, receptionist very friendly told me about the rooftop and happy hour. Only complaint for the weekend was the cleanliness of the bathroom. Could have been looked over once more, just a little dirty. Room was very small, but that was expected. Aside from the bathroom, the place was in a great location, good staff (receptionist & bartender) wish we took more advantage of the cute rooftop.
